subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Pascal Leclaire stopped 21 shots for his N.H.L.-best fifth shutout of the season as the host Columbus Blue Jackets beat the St. Louis Blues, 3-0. The Blue Jackets (8-3-2) are off to the best start in the franchise’s seven seasons.
snippet: Pascal Leclaire stopped 21 shots for his N.H.L.-best fifth shutout of the season as the host Columbus Blue Jackets beat the St. Louis Blues, 3-0. The Blue Jackets (8-3-2) are off to the best start in the franchise’s seven seasons.
